A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They had the opportunity to make this movie go in a great direction. Instead they brought sjw mindset into the movie. The direction they chose made Rey into a Sallie Sue. They made Poe into a hot head. Created a subplot of capitalism and treatment of animals to the movie. The women are calm\, calculated and center\, while the men are gullible and immature morons. The list goes on. The movie was a terrible send off for Luke. Majority of star wars fans were entertained\, but left sooooooooo disappointed
